trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGROC2LIGHTFEATHERPROVINGGROUNDS_00280_ALINAURE_000_000<tab>Oh! Hello there. Welcome to the Lightfeather Proving Grounds.

TEXT_REGROC2LIGHTFEATHERPROVINGGROUNDS_00280_ALINAURE_000_010<tab>Officially, I'm supposed to show people around and answer their questions, but in practice, that's hardly necessary, as we rarely see new faces around here.
TEXT_REGROC2LIGHTFEATHERPROVINGGROUNDS_00280_ALINAURE_000_011<tab>Not that I mind. I rather like being free to watch the fights.

TEXT_REGROC2LIGHTFEATHERPROVINGGROUNDS_00280_ALINAURE_000_020<tab>As you might expect from the name, the Lightfeather Proving Grounds were originally established to host matches for battle-trained chocobos.
TEXT_REGROC2LIGHTFEATHERPROVINGGROUNDS_00280_ALINAURE_000_021<tab>That being said, House Dzemael has since allowed the grounds to be used for other purposes on occasion.

TEXT_REGROC2LIGHTFEATHERPROVINGGROUNDS_00280_ALINAURE_000_022<tab>Some other houses have staged spectacles, for both private and public amusement. The Temple Knights have also held exhibitions in the past as well─those are always a delight, believe you me.
